title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
summary: Implement a robust authentication system with multiple verification layers for secure customer access.
description: Develop a secure login mechanism that combines traditional credentials such as username and password with additional verification factors like OTPs, biometric data, or authenticator apps. Ensure encryption of authentication data and compliance with financial security standards like PCI-DSS. This epic aims to safeguard customer accounts against unauthorized access while maintaining a smooth and convenient login experience.

title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
summary: Provide a digital banking dashboard tailored to individual customer profiles and product eligibility.
description: Develop an interactive, real-time dashboard displaying account balances, transaction summaries, and curated product offers based on customer profiles. Integrate backend analytics to predict eligibility for new financial products such as loans, cards, or deposits. The dashboard will serve as the central hub for all customer activities, providing quick access to actions like transfers, payments, and service requests.

title: Responsive Multi-Platform Portal Interface
summary: Design a responsive interface to ensure consistent access across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
description: Develop a responsive and visually appealing portal interface compatible with multiple devices and browsers. Apply adaptive UI/UX principles to provide consistent interactions on any screen size while maintaining performance standards. Incorporate accessibility features following WCAG guidelines, enabling all users, including differently-abled customers, to easily navigate and use the portal.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable customers to complete account openings and service modifications through digital workflows.
description: Create structured, guided digital workflows for various banking services such as account openings and modifications. Automate processes with minimal manual steps using eKYC, form pre-fills, and backend integrations. Provide clear progress steps with visual indicators, reducing branch dependency. Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements while enhancing customer convenience.

title: Save and Resume Capability for Incomplete Applications
summary: Allow customers to save partially completed workflows and resume them securely at a later stage.
description: Implement a save-and-resume feature that securely stores incomplete workflows, such as account applications or service requests, allowing users to complete them later from any device. Store partial data in encrypted form and display application status upon login. Include automated reminders for incomplete applications via email or SMS notifications, ensuring customer convenience and improved completion rates.

title: Secure Document Upload and Verification System
summary: Enable secure submission and processing of verification documents within the customer portal.
description: Provide customers a secure interface to upload documents required for service requests, KYC verification, or regulatory purposes. Enforce file size and type validation, encrypt all uploaded files, and integrate automated document verification workflows. Implement backend review processes with result notifications to customers upon approval or rejection, ensuring compliance and operational efficiency.

title: Real-Time Notifications and Status Updates
summary: Deliver instant updates and alerts for customer requests and transactions within the portal.
description: Introduce a real-time update system notifying customers about changes in their account opening or service request status. Integrate email, SMS, and in-portal notifications to keep customers informed at all stages of processing. Implement push-based communication for transparency and proactive engagement, ensuring customers are aware of key milestones and next steps in real time.

title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
summary: Track all customer actions and system interactions in a secure, auditable log for compliance and transparency.
description: Implement a system-wide logging and audit trail that captures all actions, including logins, document submissions, and service requests. Equip customers with a read-only interaction history to monitor their activities, while enabling administrators and auditors to generate compliance reports. Ensure data integrity through encryption and immutability mechanisms in audit storage systems.

title: Core Banking System Integration Layer
summary: Integrate the customer portal seamlessly with the bank's core systems for real-time data exchange.
description: Develop a secure integration layer that connects the portal with the bankâ€™s core systems via APIs and middleware. Synchronize customer profiles, account balances, and service operations across both platforms in real time. Implement error handling, load balancing, and encrypted data transmission to guarantee safe, reliable, and scalable operations while maintaining data consistency.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
summary: Implement access control levels to ensure users and staff access only permissible areas of the system.
description: Design and implement a role-based access control framework allowing granular permission assignments for customers, administrators, and support staff. Control visibility and interaction with sensitive data based on user type. Log all access attempts, granting and revoking privileges as required. Ensure full compliance with organizational policies and regulatory access standards.

title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Develop an independent, optimized database to handle portal-specific operations securely and efficiently.
description: Create a dedicated database structure that handles portal-specific data such as user profiles, document uploads, and historic interactions. Apply database optimization techniques like indexing, caching, and replication for better performance. Implement automated backup, encryption, and performance monitoring to ensure scalability, fault tolerance, and high system reliability.
